name: Derro, Voidwarped
description: The Derro, Voidwarped is a small humanoid creature characterized by its high agility and strong magical capabilities. It has a strange appearance that might include disheveled features reflecting its insanity and void influence.
memorable: Its ability to inflict cold and psychic damage while potentially reducing opponents' hit points makes it a terrifying foe.
goals: The Derro aims to incapacitate and dominate its foes, using its powerful psychic abilities.
relations: Often found alongside other Derro or dark creatures of the Underdark, it may serve darker powers or deities.
environment: Typically found in the Underdark or dark, subterranean environments.
strengths: resistances to force and psychic damage
weaknesses: Sunlight sensitivity, which disadvantages its attacks and perception in direct sunlight.
attacks: Utilizes shortsword and void tendril attacks, inflicting piercing, cold, and force damage.
most_powerful_ability: Void Speech Rant inflicts substantial psychic damage and can incapacitate multiple foes.
skills: Has an average perception skill of +3.
additional_information: Has advantage on saves against charm or fear.
Can survive without air or ambient pressure.
Weapon attacks deal extra cold and force damage.
Can reduce target's maximum hit points with its void tendril attack.
Easily maneuvers in battle due to flying ability.
test_queries: small flying creature with magical attacks
insane humanoid immune to cold damage
Underdark monster with powerful psychic abilities
dark creature that reduces hit points
